ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Date of Last Auto Welcome Email field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Date_of_Last_Auto_Welcome_Email__c), ( NOT(ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(Date_of_Last_Auto_Welcome_Email__c))) ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the 'Date of Last Auto Welcome Email' value.
